mean_en: feeling or showing acceptance that something unpleasant will happen or will not change
sentence: I guess I\u0027m resigned to the fact that I\u0027ll never climb Mount Everest.
sentence_trans: 我想我已经接受了我永远也登不上珠穆朗玛峰的现实。
word_etyma: re回、向后 ＋ sign\u003dmark，表示“记号，信号”\" ＋ ed...的 → resign辞职 ＋ ed...的 → resigned顺从的；已辞职的
